name: Honnect
description:
The main target of this game is to remove all tiles: choose and tap at the tile to select it, then find identical tiles and try to connect them with up to 3 straight lines where there are no other tiles blocking on the connecting line path.
Enjoy the unique and inimitable collections of animals, juicy fruits, artifacts, jewels with gems and more.
Don't forget about additional interactive 3D quest: rake your way through the gameplay, increase your skill, earn more coins and spend them by restoring a wonderful room to its former beauty.
Collect all of the home rooms and a special 3D home will be ready for you.
To earn coins faster you can increase your pair matching speed, less time to honnect = more coins!
We do not want you to be bored: so you can pick the pack you really admire and dive in relaxation with a pair matching game - Honnect.

Honnect - acceptable for all ages and great time filler for insomniacs.
